name: FPS Savior
description: Switch between High, Low, and Super Low graphic settings to help reduce lag. Not compatible with SFX Toggle. For help type [ /fpssavior help ] ingame or refer to the website for more information.

name: Zoomy Plus
description: Zoom closer/farther then normal and rotate your camera to capture neat pictures. For help type [ /zplus help ] ingame or refer to the website for more information.

name: Wonderland
description: Increase/Decrease the size of yourself/targets, and rotate the direction targets face, for neat pictures and all around fun (on your screen only). Type [ /wonderland ] or [ /wl ] ingame to open & close Wonderland. Refer to the website for more information.

name: The Bigger They Are
description: Tired of not being able to target mounted players as a mouse mode user? Banish their companions and make their heads triple in size! This addon automatically sends a mounted players companion into the void (on your screen), so you cant accidently target the companion and triples the size of the owners head as an indicator that the player is mounted. Refer to the website for more information.

name: Swapit
description: Adds 2 additional weapon set slots to swap between using [ /swapit ] or [ /si ] as long as you have the 'Weapon Swap' attribute. For help type [ /swapit help ] or [ /si help ] ingame or refer to the website for more information.

name: Mount 'er Good
description: Sick of your pet getting stuck somewhere leaving you with nothing to mount? Well here you go, this addon teleports your companion to you if its not within range when you try to mount. Refer to the website for more information.
